# Courthouse (Building)
## Overview
**Courthouse**

**Create** 43 Goods, 2 Influence, 41 Labor, 1 Magic (1,840 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 2 [[Cell (Room)|Cells]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]]

A building where cases are heard and disputes resolved according to the rule of law by generally impartial justices.
